rescuecore2.standard.entities

Class Human

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.worldmodel.AbstractEntity
      • rescuecore2.standard.entities.StandardEntity
        • rescuecore2.standard.entities.Human
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmbulanceTeam, Civilian, FireBrigade, PoliceForce

    public abstract class Human
extends StandardEntity
    Abstract base class for Humans.
